verses.roman:
prabhu caliyāchena bindu-mādhava-daraśane
lakṣa lakṣa loka āise prabhura milane

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caliyāchena—was going; bindu-mādhava-daraśane—to see Lord Bindu Mādhava; lakṣa lakṣa loka—many hundreds of thousands of people; āise—came; prabhura—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; milane—for meeting.
translation: At Prayāga, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to see the temple of Bindu Mādhava, and many hundreds of thousands of people followed Him just to meet Him.
